name: Capital expenditures in the United States, total and used for domestic R&D, by type of expenditure, industry, and company size: 2021
description: Capital expenditures in the United States, total and used for domestic R&D, by type of expenditure, industry, and company size: 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: selected_industry_naics_code_and_company_size
variableMeasured.description: Selected industry, NAICS code, and company size hierarchy

variableMeasured.name: field_used_for_domestic_r_da_totalb_c
variableMeasured.description: Used For Domestic R Da Totalb C

variableMeasured.name: field_used_for_domestic_r_da_land_acquisition
variableMeasured.description: Used For Domestic R Da Land Acquisition

variableMeasured.name: field_used_for_domestic_r_da_buildings_and_land_improvementd
variableMeasured.description: Used For Domestic R Da Buildings And Land Improvementd

variableMeasured.name: field_used_for_domestic_r_da_equipment
variableMeasured.description: Used For Domestic R Da Equipment

variableMeasured.name: field_used_for_domestic_r_da_capitalized_software
variableMeasured.description: Used For Domestic R Da Capitalized Software

variableMeasured.name: field_used_for_domestic_r_da_other_intellectual_property
variableMeasured.description: Used For Domestic R Da Other Intellectual Property

variableMeasured.name: field_used_for_domestic_r_da_all_other_and_undistributede
variableMeasured.description: Used For Domestic R Da All Other And Undistributede

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Industry classification was based on dominant business code for domestic R&D performance, where available. For companies that did not report business codes, the classification used for sampling was assigned. An estimate range may be displayed in place of a single estimate to avoid disclosing operations of individual companies.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and U.S. Census Bureau, Business Enterprise Research and Development Survey, 2021.
